name: space-invaders
description: Space Invaders in Javascript for an it-talents.de competition
author: Mathias Bockwoldt

scripts.test: node --require esm node_modules/qunit/bin/qunit.js && node node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint.js --global input *.js && node node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint.js --global QUnit --rule 'max-len: 0' --rule 'max-lines-per-function: 0' test/*.js
